column2: best_bts_song <- spotify_data %>% select(track_name, track_album_name, artist_name, track_popularity)
summarised_data <- best_bts_song %>% group_by(track_album_name) %>% summarise(song_count = n()) %>% arrange(desc(song_count)) %>% slice(1:10)
plot2 <- summarised_data %>% ggplot(aes(song_count, track_album_name)) + geom_col(aes(fill = song_count), position = "dodge")
